name: Enlightra
headline: Multicolor lasers for ultrafast data transmission
description: Enlightra develops mass-manufacturable fingertip-size multicolor lasers enabling ultrafast data communication and optical computing while providing up to 10x improvement in energy efficiency and cost reduction.

founders.name: John Jost, Founder
founders.description: John has more than 20 years of experience in quantum, atomic, and optical physics and authored more than 70 publications while working with 2 Nobel Prize winners in physics (2012,2005). Dr. Jost has raised more than $2mio in non-dilutive funding for Enlightra

founders.name: Maxim Karpov, Founder
founders.description: Entrepreneur with a strong research background, PhD in Physics, and >8 years of experience in photonics and laser technologies. Maxim has co-authored >40 research papers in top peer-reviewed journals including Nature and Science and has received multiple international awards for his research work. He has a successful track record of managing international research projects and fundraising.

generated_description:
Enlightra is a pioneering company that began its journey in 2021, focusing on the development of multicolor lasers tailored for ultrafast data transmission. Based in Ecublens, Switzerland, and part of the Y Combinator Batch W22, Enlightra stands out in the hard-tech sector with its innovative approach to optical computing.

The mission? To revolutionize data communication with compact, mass-manufacturable lasers that significantly enhance energy efficiency—promising up to a 10x improvement—while also slashing costs. This isn't just about transmitting data faster; it's about doing it smarter and more sustainably.

At the heart of Enlightra's technology is their chip-scale photonic engine, capable of supporting 100 data transmission channels from a single laser with precise frequency spacing. This level of sophistication positions them uniquely in a market that craves speed and efficiency.

The company is led by founders Maxim Karpov and John Jost, both of whom bring a wealth of expertise and vision to the team of 10. With a strong foundation and a clear focus on advancing laser technology, Enlightra is not just aiming for incremental improvements; they're looking to transform how we think about data transmission entirely.

If you're intrigued by the possibilities of extreme-bandwidth data transmission enabled by light, you can reach out to them through their website at [enlightra.com](https://www.enlightra.com/) or connect via email at hi@enlightra.com. This is a company that could very well shape the future of communication technology.
